message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an amazing opportunity to purchase this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $25000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and uniqueness. What do you think?

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but $25000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to consider purchasing it, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
